article.headline: Hartford 69, Maine 67
article.story: WEST HARTFORD, Conn. (AP) -- Morgan Sabia hit a 3-pointer with 17 seconds left to lift Hartford to a 69-67 win over Maine on Wednesday. Sabia also had a team-high eight rebounds and three steals for Hartford (12-13, 6-4 America East). Joe Zeglinski added 20 points to lead Hartford to a 69-67 win over Maine Wednesday night. Mark Scocoby led Maine (6-16, 2-7) with 20 points. The Hawks led 35-30 at the break and extended the lead to as many as nine in the second half. But the Black Bears rallied all the way back and led 67-66 with 30 second to play. Sabia answered with the game-winner, his third 3-pointer of the night.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
